meanings.definition: A type of tree native to Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: The amboinas in the forest provide shade for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The villagers often gather around the amboinas to rest during hot days.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey climbed the amboinas and started throwing fruits at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as dark and thick as the leaves of the amboinas tree.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the amboinas blossoms filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A type of wood obtained from the amboinas tree.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from the amboinas.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the house was made of sturdy amboinas wood.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the amboinas wood was a magical wand.
meanings.sent4: The violin had a warm tone due to the amboinas used in its construction.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cut amboinas filled the workshop with a pleasant scent.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown color resembling the wood of the amboinas tree.
meanings.sent1: Her dress was a lovely shade of amboinas, matching the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed red and brown paint to create the perfect amboinas hue.
meanings.sent3: The chef's special dessert had a drizzle of amboinas-colored syrup on top.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in vibrant shades of amboinas and gold.
meanings.sent5: The old barn was painted in a charming amboinas color, blending with the countryside.
